explains: n. 改编本，改写本；适应，改变；适应（性），适应力；适应性变化
wordGroup: social adaptation 社会适应，适应能力
dark adaptation （黑）暗适应；暗光适应

sentences.en: This recipe is an adaptation of an old favourite.
sentences.cn: 这个食谱是一个传统名食谱的改编。

sentences.en: Most living creatures are capable of adaptation when compelled to do so.
sentences.cn: 大多数生物在为情势所迫时都能适应。

sentences.en: Branagh won two awards for his screen adaptation of Shakespeare's Henry the Fifth.
sentences.cn: 布拉纳因他对莎士比亚的《亨利五世》的荧幕改编而获了两次奖。
